attributes.class: =if([$Status] == 'Request Complete', 'ms-borderColor-greenLight', if([$Status] == 'In Progress', 'ms-borderColor-blueLight', if([$Status] == 'Equipment Checked Out', 'ms-borderColor-yellowLight', if([$Status] == 'Pending Pickup', 'ms-borderColor-gold', if([$Status] == 'Delayed', 'ms-borderColor-redLight', if([$Status] == 'Blocked', 'ms-borderColor-redLight', 'ms-borderColor-neutralLight'))))))
